greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of coefficients of elementary symmetric functions in the power sum symmetric function indexed by the integer partition with Heinz number n.
comment: The Heinz number of an integer partition (y_1, ..., y_k) is prime(y_1) * ... * prime(y_k).
formula: a(n) = 1 if n is the Heinz number of an integer partition with an even number of even parts, otherwise a(n) = -1.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Nov 20 2018
